title: Optical System Engineer - Camera Hardware
summary: Do you love taking on big challenges that require exceptionally creative solutions? Do you deeply understand how an incredible camera experience should work? As part of our Camera Technologies group, you’ll help design the innovative technology that allows each generation of Apple products to produce photos even more incredible than the last.
description:
- Work on new lens designs, characterization and integration into CMOS imager sensor based camera modules. 
- Complete analysis of the optical element's influence on the image quality characteristics of the camera module. 
- Work with suppliers on prototype design and manufacturing. 
- Troubleshoot issues with suppliers by defining proper metrology, requesting and analyzing the necessary data, and making a decision on the solution. 
- Communicate your design decision to the cross-functional team. 
- Drive your own schedule without a large overhead. 
- Take design into production.
key_qualifications:
Resourceful, prepared to champion your work in front of a large group, ready to take initiative, enjoys working in cross-functional teams
Experience in lens design, tolerance analysis
Experience in Stray light analysis
Proficiency with ZEMAX, CODE V, FRED, LightTools, etc.
Ability to perform comprehensive optical and image quality characterization of the lens and the camera module
Ability to communicate optical design decisions to multi-functional teams
Experience making difficult design decisions with limited information
Ability to analyze production data and extract relevant data
Collaborate with the assembly and packaging groups to support integration of camera lens into module
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 3 years relevant industry experience
additional_requirements:
- High energy, multi-tasker, resourceful problem solver, ability to work under pressure, take initiative.
- Working knowledge of opto-mechanics and optics manufacturing.
- Track record of imaging related innovations.
